snippet: Third-seeded Andy Murray, playing in his first tournament since back surgery in late September, was upset by Florian Mayer at the Qatar Open.
abstract: Third-seeded Andy Murray, playing in his first tournament since back surgery in late September, is upset by Florian Mayer at Qatar Open.
lead_paragraph: Third-seeded Andy Murray, playing in his first tournament since back surgery in late September, was upset by Florian Mayer at the Qatar Open.
